code:
export const passwordTips = `Make sure you:

- Use at least 6 characters
- Use a mix of upper and lower case characters
- Use at least 1 number
- Use at least 1 special character like ".", "&", or "*"
- Do not use common words or simple passwords like "password", "qwerty", or "123456"
`;
export const newPasswordTips = `
<Text>Make sure it's at least 6 characters, uses a mix of upper and lower case
characters, includes at least 1 number, 1 special character, and does not
use common words like "password", "123456" or "qwerty".<Text/>`;

sourcesContent:
export const passwordTips = `Make sure you:

- Use at least 6 characters
- Use a mix of upper and lower case characters
- Use at least 1 number
- Use at least 1 special character like ".", "&", or "*"
- Do not use common words or simple passwords like "password", "qwerty", or "123456"
`;

export const newPasswordTips = `
<Text>Make sure it's at least 6 characters, uses a mix of upper and lower case
characters, includes at least 1 number, 1 special character, and does not
use common words like "password", "123456" or "qwerty".<Text/>`;
